movie.title: Good Morning, Vietnam
movie.actors: Robin Williams, Forest Whitaker, Tung Thanh Tran, Chintara Sukapatana
movie.plot: A new Disc Jockey is shipped from Crete to Vietnam to bring humor to Armed Forces Radio. He turns the studio on its ear and becomes wildly popular with the troops but runs afoul of the middle management who think he isn't G.I. enough. While he is off the air, he tries to meet Vietnamese especially girls, and begins to have brushes with the real war that never appears on the radio.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 7 wins & 3 nominations.
movie.tomatoConsensus: A well-calibrated blend of manic comedy and poignant drama, Good Morning, Vietnam offers a captivating look at a wide range of Robin Williams' cinematic gifts.
